alert.note: Alert for Mower (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 12 at 1:50PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Mower County through 215 PM CDT... At 149 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brownsdale, or near Austin, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Grand Meadow around 200 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include County Roads 1 And 7, Highways 63 And 16, Hamilton, Dexter, Mayville, Interstate 90 And County 1, Elkton, Racine, Renova and Lansing. This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 180 and 204. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
